description: A vulnerability was found in 07FLYCMS, 07FLY-CMS and 07FlyCRM up to 20250831. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /index.php/Login/login. Performing manipulation of the argument Username results in sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been made public and could be used. This product is published under multiple names. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
